Title: Authorizes the payment of camp fees for children receiving safety net assistance or family assistance; repealer
Summary: Authorizes the payment of camp fees for children receiving safety net assistance or family assistance provided such funds cannot be obtained from other sources.
LawCode: Rpld §350 sub 1 ¶(d), amd §131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing the payment of camp fees for children receiving safety net assistance; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
